NAME: CryptoAUD
AUTHOR: Spazman0
SHORT: Fetches cryptocurrency price data in USD and AUD
DESCRIPTION:
Fetches cryptocurrency price data and converts to AUD.

Dependencies:
BeautifulSoup4 :: https://www.crummy.com/software/BeautifulSoup/bs4/doc/
PrettyTable :: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/PrettyTable
